entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 9:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 7:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then west 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
